DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of prophylaxis and on-demand treatment in children with moderate to severe hemophilia A. This study determines to compare the efficacy of prophylaxis and on-demand treatment in moderate to severe hemophilia A children in King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital, Bangkok, Thailand
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Prophylaxis and On-demand Treatment in Children With Moderate to Severe Hemophilia A
DOC.criteria: Age between 6 months to 18 years Diagnosis severe and moderate hemophilia A platelet < 100,000/mm3 No factor VIII inhibitor
